attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The prime minister should stop all  e-petitions they should all be cancelled as the prime minister and his government do not act on the results of any petitions .
as a full time carer we have submitted a petition to the government re the low level of carers allowance £53 per week, this was presented last week some 6 weeks after the prime minister said he would meet with "carers groups" yet we remain ignored therefore in my opinion all petitions are useless especialy e-petitions.
pay carers the wage we deserve not just for the work we do but for the cash we save the n.h.s. some 87 billion £`s year on year

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
